channel.title: No school
channel.description:
Hell yeah! 2 week break for me. (plus a day) What are you guys doing over your breaks?
I plan on going to our house in Michigan and snowboarding for at least a few days.

item.title: No school
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

[quote=“pk4pk, post:20, topic:251335”][quote author=davidude36 link=topic=331721.msg2591693#msg2591693 date=1229803288]
this sucks, last year I used to get 4 weeks for christmas, this year now I’m at college I get 2. =[
[/quote]
I’m in highschool and all we get is 17days, you brits are lucky[/quote]
well not really, it was a private school that I had the 4 week christmas. So usual brit schools get 2 weeks i think.

Read full topic

I’m off today due to a snowstorm, which (thankfully) got me out of a science test I was supposed to have.
[/quote]
Same here, I was so glad there was a storm. I had a math review due etc etc.

I will likely do more work on my game, and go skiing a lot.[/quote]

Your game as in a game you play? Or a game your making?

item.title: No school
item.dc:creator: @maniown maniown
item.description:
@maniown wrote:

[quote=“Tico135, post:4, topic:251335”]I’m off today due to a snowstorm, which (thankfully) got me out of a science test I was supposed to have. And now that I have 2 weeks off (22nd-5th) I have that much longer to study. ;D

I’m not really doing anything over the break, working, going out with friends, sitting at home on xbox and such, nothing out of the ordinary. If I’m extremely lucky I might get the cottage on Monday to go snowmobiling for a few days, but I’m not quite sure yet. :([/quote]

Haha i had tests also! I prolly get a week of study now.

Read full topic

I’m not really doing anything over the break, working, going out with friends, sitting at home on xbox and such, nothing out of the ordinary. If I’m extremely lucky I might get the cottage on Monday to go snowmobiling for a few days, but I’m not quite sure yet.
